titleStmt.title: Annotations for 嵇康集十一卷

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: have easy control of; have gained easy control of

tls:text.tls:line: What wisdom knows

sense.def: read zhì: human practival intelligence; intellectual competence, professional competence; intellectual capacity

tls:text.tls:line: Governance and chaos reside in the government,

sense.def: depend on N; be essentially motivated by; have one's origin in

tls:text.tls:line: 'The music of a well-governed world is peaceful and joyful;
the music of a fallen nation is sorrowful and reflective.'
and sounds and music respond to it.
Therefore, the emotions of sorrow and reflection

sense.def: real inner emotional state; innermost feelings; real inner feelings; basic feelings; basic loyalties; basic sentiments

tls:text.tls:line: are expressed in metal and stone (instruments),
are expressed in metal and stone (instruments),
and the appearances of peace and joy
and the appearances of peace and joy
are manifested in wind and string instruments.

sense.def: take physical shape in, be physically manifested in

tls:text.tls:line: are manifested in wind and string instruments.
Furthermore, Confucius, upon hearing the Shao music,
Knowing the virtue of Yu Shun;

sense.def: come to understand; come to be aware of

tls:text.tls:line: Ji Zha listened to the strings,
and knew the customs of the various states.
and knew the customs of the various states.

sense.def: the numerous (primarily of persons), the numerous (dignified objects); the many; all the various

tls:text.tls:line: These are already established facts,
not doubted by former sages.

sense.def: cast doubt upon; put into quesstion; consider something doubtful, be in doubt about

tls:text.tls:line: what is the reason for this?
If you have good news,

sense.def: polite reference to a another's forthcoming answer: a good answer, a distinguished answer to make

tls:text.tls:line: Now, receiving your enlightenment,
Now, receiving your enlightenment,
I will speak of one corner of it.
I will speak of one corner of it.
The creation of sounds,
The creation of sounds,

seg.line: 其猶臭味在於天地之間。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其猶臭味在於天地之間。
tls:text.tls:line: is like smells existing between heaven and earth.
When musical notes are arranged in sequence,
How could one allow love and hate to easily change one's principles,

sense.def: pattern of behaviour, standard of action; musical standard used in performance

tls:text.tls:line: and sounds achieve harmony,
and sounds achieve harmony,
the focus of emotions and desires.
the focus of emotions and desires.
The ancients knew that emotions should not be indulged,
and desires should not be gratified to the extreme.

sense.def: 不可從"should not be followed": should not be Vt-ed； must not be Vt-ed

tls:text.tls:line: and desires should not be gratified to the extreme.
they always regulated them,
so that sorrow did not lead to injury,
